events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting their money back for a non-fitting product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and guide the customer through the return process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you wish to get a refund for your jacket. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 4527893. The jacket hasn’t been worn and is still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process once you ship the jacket back. I will send you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I appreciate your help with this refund.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the returned jacket, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to check if you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Looking forward to the refund.
We have received the jacket and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount reflected in your bank within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. We have closed your refund request case as the process is complete. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your refund experience with our support team.
